mdRecord.dcterms:title: "Reversion to the Wild Type" and etc; 02 of 05
mdRecord.dcterms:description: 3. Doepner/Faulds--NotesItems 33-74, cloth sleeve"The Truth About Darwinism"; Reoccurring section of a periodical for BENA (British Empire Naturalist Association), where an ongoing discussion of multiple aspects of Darwinism is addressed by experts who write-in, along with editor comments. Select pages pulled for Faulds's notes. Included articles in this batch: "Reversion to the Wild Type" by John W. Hart, "The Scope of Insects and Chance" by Gabriel F. Roper, "Changes Not Effected by Natural Selection" by J. B. Scott, and "Mr. J. J. Ward Replies" by John J. Ward.; E. Kay Robinson (E. K. R.), ed., London, p. 12-16, Country-Side; 5 pages; DF n.a.
